languages.text: "Ваш флагман неприкасаем для внешних проверок из-за высокого статуса, и преступники этим пользуются. Значит, нужна внутренняя инспекция: надо поднять архивы сообщений о розыске и перепроверить личные дела экипажа — только так получится выявить и устранить потенциальные угрозы в вашу сторону".

traits.locale_text: "Преступники скрываются от Лекс Империалис, пользуясь вашим статусом Вольного Торговца. Необходимо поднять архивы сообщений о розыске и перепроверить личные дела экипажа — в первую очередь, для вашей безопасности, {name}".

languages.text: "Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."
languages.original_text: "Ваш флагман неприкасаем для внешних проверок из-за высокого статуса, и преступники этим пользуются. Значит, нужна внутренняя инспекция: надо поднять архивы сообщений о розыске и перепроверить личные дела экипажа — только так получится выявить и устранить потенциальные угрозы в вашу сторону".

traits.locale_text: "Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

"Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

"Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

"Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

"Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

languages.text: 「あなたの旗艦はその高い地位ゆえに、外部からの検査を受けることがありません。犯罪者たちはそれを利用しています。だからこそ、内部監査が必要なのです。指名手配通達の記録を照会し、クルーの記録を再確認する必要があります。それこそが、あなたにとっての潜在的な脅威を特定し、排除する唯一の方法です」
languages.original_text: "Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの旗艦はその高い地位ゆえに、外部からの検査を受けることがありません。犯罪者たちはそれを利用しています。だからこそ、内部監査が必要なのです。指名手配通達の記録を照会し、クルーの記録を再確認する必要があります。それこそが、あなたにとっての潜在的な脅威を特定し、排除する唯一の方法です」

languages.text: "Sancak geminizin yüksek statüsü nedeniyle dış denetimlerden muaf tutulması, suçluların bu durumdan faydalanmasına yol açmakta. Bu nedenle sancak gemisi bünyesinde bir iç denetim sağlanmalı ve bu kapsamda aranma dosyalarının arşivleri açılıp mürettebat kayıtları ikişer kez kontrol edilmeli. Size yönelik olası tehditleri tespit edip ortadan kaldırmanın tek yolu bu."
languages.original_text: "Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

traits.locale_text: "Sancak geminizin yüksek statüsü nedeniyle dış denetimlerden muaf tutulması, suçluların bu durumdan faydalanmasına yol açmaktadır. Bu nedenle sancak gemisi bünyesinde bir iç denetim sağlanmalı ve bu kapsamda arananlar bültenlerinin arşivleri açılıp mürettebat kayıtları ikişer kez kontrol edilmelidir. Sizlere yönelik olası tehditleri tespit edip ortadan kaldırmanın tek yolu budur."

languages.text: «Su nave insignia es intocable ante las inspecciones externas debido a su elevado estatus y los criminales se aprovechan. Así que lo que necesita es una auditoría interna: contrastar el registro de tripulantes con los boletines de criminales buscados. Es la única forma de eliminar posibles amenazas».
languages.original_text: "Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

traits.locale_text: «Su nave insignia es intocable ante las inspecciones externas debido a su elevado estatus y los criminales se aprovechan. Así que lo que necesita es una auditoría interna: contrastar el registro de tripulantes con los boletines de criminales buscados. Es la única forma de eliminar posibles amenazas».

languages.text: “你的旗舰地位尊贵，外部机构无权进行检查，而这艘船上的犯罪分子正在利用这一点。因此，你需要展开一场内部审查，调出所有通缉犯的相关档案，仔细检查所有船员的身份记录。只有这样，才能找出那些潜在的威胁，将其消灭在萌芽之中。”
languages.original_text: "Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

traits.locale_text: “你的旗舰地位尊贵，外部机构无权进行检查，而这艘船上的犯罪分子正在利用这一点。因此，你需要展开一场内部审查，调出所有通缉犯的相关档案，仔细检查所有船员的身份记录。只有这样，才能找出那些潜在的威胁，将其消灭在萌芽之中。”

languages.text: « Votre vaisseau amiral est exempté de toute inspection externe en raison de son statut élevé. Les criminels doivent en tirer parti. Vous devriez conduire un audit interne en compilant toutes les archives de criminels recherchés et en les comparant à vos effectifs. Il s'agit de la seule manière d'identifier et d'éliminer efficacement toute menace potentielle. »
languages.original_text: "Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

traits.locale_text: « Votre vaisseau amiral est exempté de toute inspection externe en raison de son statut élevé. Les criminels doivent en tirer parti. Vous devriez conduire un audit interne en compilant toutes les archives de criminels recherchés et en les comparant à vos effectifs. Il s'agit de la seule manière d'identifier et d'éliminer efficacement toute menace potentielle. »

languages.text: "Euer Flaggschiff genießt aufgrund seines hohen Status Immunität gegen externe Inspektionen, das machen sich Kriminelle zunutze. Es bedarf also einer internen Anhörung: Ihr müsst die Steckbriefe in den Archiven mit den Akten der Crew abgleichen ... das ist der einzige Weg, mögliche Bedrohungen zu identifizieren und auszuschalten."
languages.original_text: "Your flagship is untouchable for external inspections because of its high status, and criminals are taking advantage of that. So you need an internal audit: you need to pull up the archives of wanted bulletins and double-check the crew records — that is the only way to identify and eliminate potential threats to you."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Flaggschiff genießt aufgrund seines hohen Status Immunität gegen externe Inspektionen, das machen sich Kriminelle zunutze. Es bedarf also einer internen Anhörung: Ihr müsst die Steckbriefe in den Archiven mit den Akten der Crew abgleichen ... das ist der einzige Weg, mögliche Bedrohungen zu identifizieren und auszuschalten."
